guild.description:
Conservative news, commentary, memes, and organizing information.

The term "conservative" comes from the Latin verb for "to conserve or preserve," and reflects the nature of conservatives as those who seek to preserve the best of human endeavor and nature throughout all of history, measuring it qualitatively to achieve excellence (*arete*) in defiance of the human tendency toward solipsism (*hubris*).

We include all conservatives from Republicans, paleoconservatives, monarchists, anarcho-monarchists, traditionalists, Nietzscheans, crunchy conservatives, Alt-Right, Ult Right, neoreactionaries, and social conservatives onward. No socialism or egalitarianism please.

* [Moderation guidelines](http://www.amerika.org/politics/ruqqus-conservative-moderation/)
* [FAQ](http://www.amerika.org/politics/ask-a-conservative/)

We include all conservatives from Republicans, paleoconservatives, monarchists, anarcho-monarchists, traditionalists, Nietzscheans, crunchy conservatives, Alt-Right, Ult Right, neoreactionaries, and social conservatives onward. No socialism or egalitarianism please.

guild.name: Conservative

title: The conservative party needs to separate itself from the republican party

author.bio: Who was more prescient, Thomas Chittum or William Gibson?
author.bio_html: Who was more prescient, Thomas Chittum or William Gibson?

body: Conservatives need to realize there is no electoral hope for us beyond the state level and plan accordingly.
body_html: Conservatives need to realize there is no electoral hope for us beyond the state level and plan accordingly.

post.title: The conservative party needs to separate itself from the republican party

body:
Vote for Patriot Party. 

Vote against anti-Trump incumbents.
body_html:
Vote for Patriot Party.

Vote against anti-Trump incumbents.

post.title: The conservative party needs to separate itself from the republican party

author.bio: Who was more prescient, Thomas Chittum or William Gibson?
author.bio_html: Who was more prescient, Thomas Chittum or William Gibson?

body: Why?  We'll never have the presidency again, and even when we did nothing was accomplished that won't get rolled back (and then some) in the first year of Biden's presidency.
body_html: Why? We'll never have the presidency again, and even when we did nothing was accomplished that won't get rolled back (and then some) in the first year of Biden's presidency.

post.title: The conservative party needs to separate itself from the republican party

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: You alt rightists are the ones that have to go if you want to actually be any different than the leftists. Neoconservatism *was* conservatism up until about a year ago, and conservatives correctly denounced fascism as a socialist ideology. I don't understand what happened. It was always the nanny state and big government vs our freedom and rights, and now it's...big government vs big government.
body_html: You alt rightists are the ones that have to go if you want to actually be any different than the leftists. Neoconservatism was conservatism up until about a year ago, and conservatives correctly denounced fascism as a socialist ideology. I don't understand what happened. It was always the nanny state and big government vs our freedom and rights, and now it's...big government vs big government.
